reference.shortdesc: The synnoteref element references a syntax note element (synnote) that has already been defined elsewhere in the syntax diagram.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The same notation can be used in more than one syntax definition.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The synnoteref is specialized from xref. It is defined in the syntax diagram domain module, which is a specialization of the programming domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and the attribute defined below.

dlentry.dd: A reference to the target syntax note (synnote) element. The referenced syntax note must be in the same syntax diagram as the synnoteref element. See for detailed information on supported values and processing implications.
